title: Children of the Sea
description: Ruka spends her summer at the aquarium, where she’s drawn into an enigmatic aquatic event alongside two mysterious boys raised in the ocean.

title: Violet Evergarden: Eternity and the Auto Memory Doll
description: A lonely young woman feels trapped at her all girls' school. But metal hands and heartfelt letters warm her heart when Violet becomes her tutor.

title: Fireworks
description: Middle schooler Nazuna desperately wants to run away with her classmate Norimichi, who somehow turns back time on this fateful summer's day.

title: K-on! the movie
description: The seniors in Sakuragaoka High School's music club live out the graduation trip of their dreams when they celebrate by performing in London.

title: The Garden of Words
description: When a lonely teenager skips his morning classes to sit in a lovely garden, he meets a mysterious older woman who shares his feelings of alienation.

title: A Silent Voice
description: A former class bully reaches out to the deaf girl he'd tormented in grade school. He feels unworthy of redemption but tries to make things right.

title: Flavors of Youth: International Version
description: Memories in a bowl of steaming noodles, a fading beauty finding her way and a bittersweet first love – all in these stories of city life in China.

title: Miss Hokusai
description: Herself a talented artist, O-Ei works with her father, Tetsuzo, later known as Hokusai, on the woodblock prints that would make Edo famous worldwide.
